examples: Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Good afternoon! I used Canva Pro's free trial for a while, and after that one time I never really visited your site again. I was charged off funds without my approval already 2 times, although I did not give this approval and did not agree. The write-off happened from my credit card and now I also owe the bank, and now I am out of work. In general, a whole chain of problems has emerged. Please help me get the money back! May God grant you health! Thanks in advance for your understanding!
